concept.title: Hadoop Properties and Configuration Files
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the Hadoop destination to use HDFS properties.

conbody.p:
Hadoop FS destinationadditional propertiescustom propertiesHadoop FSThe Hadoop FS destination provides the following options for specifying HDFS properties:
HDFS configuration files: core-site.xml and hdfs-site.xml You can store the core-site.xml and hdfs-site.xml configuration files in a directory local to the and specify the path in the destination.
Individual properties You can configure individual HDFS properties in the destination. To add an HDFS property, you specify the exact property name and the value. The Hadoop FS destination does not validate the property names or values.Individual properties override properties defined in the HDFS configuration file.
